page.shortlink: api extension namespace json class to resultsetex method
page.description: Create a result set from json and optional table info (schema).
page.prototype: .ToResultSetEx as SQL::ResultSet (json as C, settings as extension::ToResultSetSettings)

argument.name: json
argument.description: Json data used to populate the result set object

argument.name: settings
argument.description: ResultSet Settings, more options for creating a result set object

page.example:
dim rss as extension::ToResultSetSettings rss.RowsAffected = 1 rs = extension::JSON::ToResultSetEx("[{\"fname\" : \"john\" , \"lname\" : \"Public\" }",rss) ? rs.ToString() = "john Public"
? rs.CallResult.RowsAffected = 1
